short_summary: RFP for the acquisition of Office furniture category 1, 2, 5 SA E60PQ-140003 located in Montrétéal, Québec, Canada.
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 15, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
